DOC.brief_summary: This study follows the results of the COMPALICLAMP study (NCT00951392) where the investigators showed a differential expression of sirtuins protein isoforms, Sirt6, in muscle depending on the quality of aging. The investigators seek to confirm this difference in expression level of circulating leukocytes on a larger sample.
DOC.brief_title: Circulating SIRT6 Expression, Effect on Aging Quality
DOC.criteria: Volunteers from the SUVIMAX 2 aging cohort Men and women Older than 60 Subject with a global aging quality score of 1 or 3 in the SU.VI.MAX. 2 study Covered by Health Insurance System Subject not in compliance with the recommendation of French National Law
